pr_title: Fix incorrect variable assignment in DynamicClusterChangeHandler

timeline.message:
Fix a bug in variable assigment in DynamicClusterChangeHandler

PR1522 mistakenly assigned getStoppedReplicas() from dataNodeConfig to
sealedReplicas variable. This PR fixed it and added debug log.

timeline.bodyText: This change comes from formatting file. No logic change.
